name: Light of Jah
description: Light of Jah is a sativa-dominant cannabis strain whose name is often used interchangeably with Jack Herer, but may also refer to a Jack Herer and Afghani hybrid. This hybridized rendition still leans toward the sativa side with uplifting effects that fuel creativity and positive moods. Its flavor is a sweet combination of tropical fruit and hashy, peppery spice.Â
attributes_title: Happy, Uplifted, Energetic, Euphoric, Focused, Stress, Depression, Pain, Fatigue, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Headache
